CustomField.formula: IMAGE('https://chart.googleapis.com/chart?chs=150x150&cht=qr&chl='+ SUBSTITUTE(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_310, FIND( '/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_310) )+Id, 'https://', 'https%3A%2F%2F' ), 'Scan the QR code to create contact in your mobile' )
CustomField.label: QR Code
